sources.title: King Kelly of the U.S.A.
sources.description: A theatrical troupe headed by a flashy showman finds itself in the tiny--and bankrupt--kingdom of Belgardia. The showman falls in love with the daughter of the dotty king, who has promised her to another.

sources.title: King Kelly of the U.S.A. (1934)

The showman falls in love with the daughter of the dotty king, who has promised her to another. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/king-kelly-of-the-u-s-a-1934/

sources.title: King Kelly of the U.S.A. (1934) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Guy Robertson, Edgar Kennedy, Irene Ware 
Director: Leonard Fields

A theatrical troupe headed by a flashy showman finds itself in the tiny--and bankrupt--kingdom of Belgardia. Complications ensue when the showman falls in love with the daughter of the dotty king, who has promised her to another.

metadata.Plot: A theatrical troupe headed by a flashy showman finds itself in the tiny--and bankrupt--kingdom of Belgardia. The showman falls in love with the daughter of the dotty king, who has promised her to another. Complications ensue.
metadata.Writer: George C. Bertholon, Howard Higgin, David Silverstein
metadata.Actors: Guy Robertson, Edgar Kennedy, Irene Ware
